net.canarymod.hook.player

Class ChatHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.hook.Hook
      • net.canarymod.hook.CancelableHook
        • net.canarymod.hook.player.ChatHook

  • public final class ChatHook
extends CancelableHook
    Chat hook. Contains player, prefix, message and receivers information
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter)

      • getFormat

        public java.lang.String getFormat()
        Get the chat format. This is a string like this:
        <%prefix %name> %message You can modify this to your liking. Replacement values can be found in the placeholder map.
        This is a formatting template, do not replace the placeholders with real values. This will happen automatically.
        Returns:
        the format

      • setFormat

        public void setFormat(java.lang.String format)
        Override the default chatting format.
        Parameters:
        format - the format to set
        See Also:
        getFormat()

      • setPlaceholder

        public void setPlaceholder(java.lang.String placeholder,
                           java.lang.String value)
        Set or override a placeholder and a value
        Parameters:
        placeholder - the palceholder, such as %name or %extraData - something to your liking
        value - The value to substitute the placeholder with when the chat message is dispatched

      • removePlaceholder

        Parameters:
